long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
delphai Extension for Google Chrome

Access delphai's comprehensive firmographic data directly from your browser with the delphai Extension for Google Chrome.

Discover essential information on companies across the private and public markets including industries, revenue, employee count, location, and more as you browse the web. With unparalleled insights and analytics always just a click away, you can easily find, assess, and pursue promising opportunities, without moving between tabs.

To use this product, you must log in with an existing delphai account.

➤ Save time

Highlight and right-click on a company or search within the extension. Uncover everything from basic details (like founded year to employee count) to hard-to-find firmographic info (like revenue breakdowns and key competitors) as you browse.

➤ Streamline your workflow

Get all the firmographic information you need in one place. Your search history and followed companies are instantly synced to delphai.

➤ Unmatched access to the entire global market

Finding and assessing the best opportunities is made easy with comprehensive data on public companies and superior insight into the private market, accessible with just a single click.

➤  Sync with your CRM:
Seamlessly enrich your CRM with up-to-date firmographic data from delphai. Add new companies to your CRM with a single click and get access to enriched data on your current prospects and customers.

Start leveraging delphai's powerful firmographic data to enhance your target identification.
